description: This file sets up and demonstrates the usage of an agent with memory and storage components connected to a PostgreSQL database, including printing responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model, memory, storage, and settings.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: Handles PostgreSQL database interactions for storing memory data.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Manages in-memory data structures for the agent.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents the OpenAI chat model used by the agent.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: Handles PostgreSQL database interactions for session storage.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent, optionally streaming the output.
